project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of: (i) about 52 miles of lateral sewers varying in size from 9 to 15 inches; (ii) about 16 miles of trunk sewers ranging in size from 15 to 60 inches; (iii) improvements to an existing sewage treatment plant; (iv) construction of four new pumping stations; (v) construction of three new sewage treatment facilities; and (vi) consulting services.
